assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Assign_Field_Values_To_Application
assignments.label: Copy 1 of Assign Field Values To Application

choices.name: Land_for_Streets_or_Public_Transportation
choices.choiceText: Land for Streets or Public Transportation

value.stringValue: Land for Streets or Public Transportation

formulas.name: Formula_Minimum_Lot_Size
formulas.expression:
IF(AND(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Exempt Subdivision Application", {!Min_Lot_Size}<10, {!Subdivision_Type}="10+ Acre Estate Lot")),False,
IF(AND({!Min_Lot_Size}>{!AcreageFromParcel}),False,
IF(AND({!Copy_1_of_Min_Lot_Size}>{!AcreageFromParcel}),False,
True)))

formulas.name: Formula_Text_Min_Lot_Size
formulas.expression:
IF(AND(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Exempt Subdivision Application", {!Min_Lot_Size}<10, {!Subdivision_Type}="10+ Acre Estate Lot")),"All lots created shall be at least 10 acres in area or larger for exempt subdivision applications with the type of '10+ Acre Estate Lot'",
IF(AND({!Min_Lot_Size}>{!AcreageFromParcel}),"The minimum lot size cannot be greater than the acreage",
IF(AND({!Copy_1_of_Min_Lot_Size}>{!AcreageFromParcel}),"The minimum lot size cannot be greater than the acreage",
"The input is not valid for this application type. Please refer to the UDO for requirements.")))

formulas.name: Lot_Validation_Subdivision_Formula
formulas.expression:
IF( AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Major Subdivision Application",{!Proposed_Number_of_Lots}<2),"Major subdivision applications must have 2 or more lots",
IF(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Minor Subdivision Application",{!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>5),"Minor subdivision applications can have up to 5 lots",
IF(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Limited Subdivision Application",{!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>3),"Limited subdivisions applications can have a maximum of 3 lots",
IF(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Exempt Subdivision Application",{!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>3,{!Subdivision_Type}="Two Acres into Three Lots"),"Exempt subdivision applications with the type of 'Two Acres into Three Lots' can have a maximum of 3 lots",
IF(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Exempt Subdivision Application",{!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>{!Copy_1_of_Number_of_Existing_Lots},{!Subdivision_Type}="Combination/Recombination"),"Exempt subdivision applications with the type of 'Combination/Recombination' cannot have the proposed number of lots exceed number of existing lots",
"The input is not valid for this application type. Please refer to the UDO for requirements.")))))

formulas.name: Test
formulas.expression:
IF( AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Major Subdivision Application",{!Proposed_Number_of_Lots}<2),False,
IF(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Minor Subdivision Application",{!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>5),False,
IF(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Limited Subdivision Application",{!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>3),False,
IF(AND(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Exempt Subdivision Application", {!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>3, {!Subdivision_Type}="Two Acres into Three Lots")),False,
IF(AND(AND({!Record_Type_Name} = "Exempt Subdivision Application", {!Copy_1_of_Proposed_Number_of_Lots}>{!Copy_1_of_Number_of_Existing_Lots}, {!Subdivision_Type}="Combination/Recombination")),False,
True)))))

loops.label: Loop Through and Relate Application Contacts

fields.name: Static_Text_Conservation_50
fields.fieldText: Conservation areas occupying less than 50 percent of a Conservation Subdivision site is not allowed.

fields.name: Display_text_CSD_Public_System_Req

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Cannot_Apply_10
fields.fieldText: The acreage for the selected parcel(s) is {!AcreageFromParcel}. The acreage for "10+ Acre Estate Lot" cannot be below 10 acres.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Are_you_the_owner_of_all_parcels_included_on_the_subdivision
fields.fieldText: Are you the owner of all parcels included on the subdivision?

fields.name: Is_this_application_for_a_family_subdivision
fields.fieldText: Is this application for a family subdivision?

fields.name: Display_text_family_subdivision
fields.fieldText:
In cases where the Minor Subdivision is also a Family Subdivision, the following criteria shall also apply in addition to the criteria in sub-section (1) above:

a. The owner and grantee certify, in writing, that the grantee of each lot is the husband, wife, mother, father, brother, sister, child (biological, adopted, or step), grandmother, grandfather, grandchild (biological, adopted, or step), aunt, uncle, niece, or nephew of the owner;

b. The owner and grantee certify, in writing, that no consideration shall be paid for any of the lots; and

c. The owner and grantee certify that the purpose of the Minor Subdivision is not to circumvent the provisions of this Ordinance, and that none of the lots shall be conveyed to third parties for a period of not less than three years, and that the plat shall indicate this three-year limitation.

d. Family subdivisions shall not be subject to the limit on successive minor subdivisions in Section 2.3.18F, Limit on Successive Minor Subdivisions.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Display_Text_Limited_Expedited
